events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The shipping is really late and I'm worried about when it will be delivered.
The customer's message indicates a delayed delivery issue with late shipping and no tracking updates.
Assigning the case to the Delivery Support Team for further analysis and response.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your order is delayed, and I'm here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you may have received so I can check the status?
My order number is 123456789. Unfortunately, the tracking link just says 'Label created' and hasn't updated in days. This is very frustrating.
Thank you for the details. I've escalated this to our shipping partner and requested expedited handling. You should receive an update within 24 hours.
I appreciate your quick response and the escalation. Iâ€™ll wait for the update but hope it arrives soon as I need the item urgently.
Forwarding the issue to senior shipping support to prioritize the delivery and ensure immediate tracking updates.
Your package has now been dispatched and is out for delivery today. We apologize for the delay and thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm you received your order today. Please let us know if everything is in good condition.
Yes, I received the package and everything is perfect. Thanks for your help in resolving this quickly!
Closing this case as the delivery issue has been resolved and the customer has confirmed receipt.
